name: Neco-Arc Destroyer 2
description:
You've heard of Click The Ghosts (maybe), but now it's time to get ready for Neco-Arc Destroyer 2!

With over 5 different types of neco-arcs, you must click all of them to destroy and kill them! Ahaha yes! DESTROY THEM ALL!!

Note: Contains content that I didn't make. The music, stock images, heck even the sprites are all not made by me. And I don't have the rights to them. So uh, don't sue me please.
